name: GPU WARS
description:
Mine CateCoin, make duCates.

Remember you can hide/inventory slots on your rigs by Right-clicking them.

You can also move your rigs around by Left-clicking them. So convenient! :3

The WebGL doesn't work no matter what, thanks Unity.

Submission for UDC Game Jam #17 more deets coming soon, I need to rest for a second.
